availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Demaris Lemons. Father of Jas R. Lemons, Jo M. Lemons, Geo W. Lemons, Jalie A. Lemons, Martha M. Lemons, and Margaret Lemons. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 834
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 246B
Find A Grave, Joseph G. Lemons (December 23, 1818-January 21, 1885), Memorial #35639521, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35639521 (accessed August 27, 2019).
